text: The Linfen Ring Expressway (), designated as G0501 is an expressway in Southern Central China going around the city of Linfen. This expressway is a branch of G5 Jingkun Expressway. ==Route== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" width="600px" ! text-align="center" colspan="3" | 15px Counterclockwise 15px |- | || 30px 25px || 30px G5 Jingkun Expresway |- | || 25px || 30px S224 Road Hongdong |- | || 25px || 30px G108 Road Ganting-Hongdong |- | || 25px || 40px G0511 Mingqu Expressway |- style="background:#ffefd5;" | colspan="3" | 30px15px Under Construction 15px30px |- style="background:#ffefd5;" | || 25px || 30px G309 Road Quting |- style="background:#ffefd5;" | || 30px 25px || 30px30px G22 Qinglan Expressway |- ! text-align="center" colspan="3" | 15px Clockwise 15px |} ==References== Category:Expressways in Shanxi Category:Linfen
title: G0501 Linfen Ring Expressway
